code: import{cartTypes}from"./cart.types";export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:cartTypes.TOOGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:cartTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:cartTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:cartTypes.CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};
